package testdata

import (
	"github.com/garsue/otwgen/generate/testdata"
	"go.opencensus.io/trace"
)

type Bar struct {
	*testdata.Bar
}

func NewBar(orig *testdata.Bar) *Bar {
	return &Bar{orig}
}
func (r *Bar) MustMethod(ctx context.Context) {
	ctx, span := trace.StartSpan(ctx, "auto generated span")
	defer span.End()
	r.Bar.MustMethod(ctx)
}
func (r *Bar) Method(ctx context.Context) error {
	ctx, span := trace.StartSpan(ctx, "auto generated span")
	defer span.End()
	return r.Bar.Method(ctx)
}

func MustFoo(ctx context.Context) { // noinspection GoUnusedExportedFunction
	ctx, span := trace.StartSpan(ctx, "auto generated span")
	defer span.End()
	testdata.MustFoo(ctx)
}
func Foo(ctx context.Context, body aliasedIO.Reader) (err error) {
	ctx, span := trace.StartSpan(ctx, "auto generated span")
	defer span.End()
	return testdata.Foo(ctx, body)
}
func Send(ctx context.Context, request *http.Request) (err error) {
	ctx, span := trace.StartSpan(ctx, "auto generated span")
	defer span.End()
	return testdata.Send(ctx, request)
}
